```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(xtable)
library(texreg)
library(lmtest)
```

```{r}
load(file="~/R Workspace/ENVE/Rdata/models_r_v_stata.Rdata")
```

```{r}
l_mods <- list(m1=m1, m2=m2, m3=m3, m4=m4.0, m4.1=m4.1,
               m4.2=m4.2, m4.3=m4.3, m4.4=m4.4, m4.null=m4.null)

for (i in 1:length(l_mods))
{
  print(names(l_mods[i]))
  print(summary(l_mods[[i]]))
  print("=====================================")
  print("=====================================")
}
```


```{r, results='asis'}
texreg(l_mods)
print(xtable(anova(m4.0, m4.1, m4.2, m4.3, m4.4, m4.null)))
print(xtable(lrtest(m1,m2,m3,m4.0, m4.1, m4.2, m4.3, m4.4, m4.null)))
```
